      • checkForCheck

        public boolean checkForCheck(boolean Team)
        Check if either team is in 'Check'
        Parameters:
        Team - The team who is being checked for being in 'Check'. - False is for White - True is for Black
        Returns:
        True if the team is in 'Check', false otherwise.
